name: SimonSaysGame
0:
”Alexa, start Simon says game”
”Alexa, launch Simon says game”
”Alexa, begin Simon says game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simon says game
des:
Alexa is designated Simon. 
Alexa enable "Simon Says Game" enables the skill.
Alexa start "Simon says game" starts the game.

Game instructions:
Simon tells players what they must do. However, the players must only obey commands that begin with the words "Simon Says." If Simon says, "Simon says touch your head," then players must touch their head. But, if Simon simply says, "jump," without first saying "Simon says," players must not jump. Those that do jump are out.

Objective
Follow directions from Simon and stay in the game for as long as possible! The last player standing wins.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
